Item ID1143

The mithril med helm is a medium helmet made of mithril. This helm requires 20 Defence to wear. It provides more protection than its bronze, iron and steel counterparts. It can be made at level 53 Smithing using a mithril bar.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3+0
 Defence bonuses
+10+11+9-1+10
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List
